properties.name: mImpactAudioEvent
properties.comment: When pawn take damage from a source, they play this take damage event

properties.name: mImpactAudioSetting
properties.comment: Specify if the audio from this damage type should overrride the damage sound in hit pawn, or add to it

properties.name: mImpactParticle
properties.comment: When pawn take damage from a source, they play this take damage event

properties.name: mImpactParticleSetting
properties.comment: Specify if the audio from this damage type should overrride the damage effect in hit pawn, or add to it

properties.name: mShouldDamageDestructible
properties.comment: Should this damage type hurt destrucrible actors?

properties.name: mDamageImpulseZ
properties.comment: How much extra impulse should be added in Z direction for this damage type

properties.name: mShouldShockEnemy
properties.comment: Should this damage type shock and scare the enemy, like the stun spear?
